item.title: 亚洲开发银行在一份报告中说，欧盟对高碳进口商品征收关税的计划可能会损害亚洲发展中国家的利益，但不太可能大幅减少温室气体排放。更多内容请点击此处：
item.description:
A European Union plan to impose tariffs on high-carbon imports could hurt developing countries in Asia but is unlikely to lead to big reductions in greenhouse gas emissions, the Asian Development Bank said in a report. More here: https://t.co/xhOIP7QnM4

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 26, 2024

item.title: 美国通用汽车公司在法国发布了豪华电动汽车凯迪拉克 Lyriq，这是该公司继去年重返欧洲后在欧洲市场的又一次扩张，同时也是对在线销售能否吸引富裕汽车买家的一次检验。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
US automaker General Motors unveiled its luxury electric Cadillac Lyriq in France, an expansion of its market in Europe after returning last year and a test of whether online-only sales will attract wealthy car buyers. More here: https://t.co/RNTIIxG6ly

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 26, 2024

item.title: 美国政府债券市场的抛售正在加速，因为强劲的经济削弱了美联储即将降息的希望。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
A sell-off in the US government bond market is picking up speed, as a strong economy whittles away at hopes for imminent interest rate cuts from the Federal Reserve. More here: https://t.co/4TObJkt7sB

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 26, 2024

item.title: 观看：上周美国人工智能芯片制造商英伟达（Nvidia）的强劲财报提振了科技股的情绪，受此提振，日本日经平均股价创下历史新高。
item.description:
WATCH: Japan's Nikkei share average hit a new record high, boosted by gains in index heavyweights and after last week's strong earnings from US AI chip maker Nvidia lifted sentiment on tech stocks https://t.co/8q2Mj2ScVl pic.twitter.com/JonUrFMEoq

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 26, 2024

item.title: 据彭博社报道，蚂蚁金服集团出价超过 Citadel 收购瑞士信贷中国部门
item.description:
Ant Group outbids Citadel for Credit Suisse's China unit, Bloomberg reports https://t.co/yAjl0Oywea pic.twitter.com/shknaxD1ge

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 26, 2024

item.title: 瑞安航空公司首席执行官迈克尔-奥利里（Michael O'Leary）表示，到 6 月底，该公司接收的波音飞机数量将比之前预计的更少，这可能会促使这家廉价航空公司在一年中最繁忙的时候削减夏季航班计划。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
Ryanair will receive even fewer Boeing aircraft by the end of June than previously expected, CEO Michael O'Leary said, potentially prompting the budget carrier to cut its summer schedule at the busiest time of the year. More here: https://t.co/qRIRS08hvu pic.twitter.com/UWiwi9qwXa

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 26, 2024

item.title: 来自世界几乎所有国家的贸易部长齐聚阿布扎比，参加旨在制定新的全球商业规则的世界贸易组织会议。
item.description:
Trade ministers from nearly every country in the world gather in Abu Dhabi for a World Trade Organization meeting that aims to set new global commerce rules, but even its ambitious chief Ngozi Okonjo-Iweala has sought to curb expectations https://t.co/mZSVrhiLxK pic.twitter.com/ATfHceeh9N

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 26, 2024

item.title: 本周，全球顶级能源贸易公司准备在伦敦举行一年一度的行业盛会，他们面临着一个日益严重的问题：如何处理他们的现金。更多信息，请点击此处：
item.description:
As the world's top global energy trading houses prepare for their biggest annual industry get-together this week in London they face a growing problem, what to do with their cash. More here: https://t.co/axxoE7LEgq

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 26, 2024

item.title: 观看：来自加纳行业监管机构的两位消息人士称，加纳2023/24年度的可可产量预计将比82万吨的目标低近40%。以下是本周非洲顶级商业新闻综述
item.description:
WATCH: Ghana's cocoa output for the 2023/24 season is expected to be almost 40% below a target of 820,000 metric tons, two sources from the country's sector regulator said. Here's a roundup of the top business stories from Africa this week https://t.co/VRsGWlawra pic.twitter.com/hLwuxDYnGE

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 24, 2024
